rajawali.materials.shaders

Class AShaderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.materials.shaders.AShaderBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AShader

    public abstract class AShaderBase
extends java.lang.Object

    This abstract class defines all the data types that are used in a shader. The data types reflect the data types that are used in GLSL. Because most of the data type names are reserved keywords in Java they are prefixed with 'R'.
    For instance:

    • float: AShaderBase.RFloat
    • vec2: AShaderBase.RVec2
    • vec4: AShaderBase.RVec4
    • mat3: AShaderBase.RMat3
    • sampler2D: AShaderBase.RSampler2D
    Author:
    dennis.ippel

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AShaderBase.DataType
      This enum contains a mapping to GLSL data types names.
      static class  AShaderBase.DefaultShaderVar
      The default shader variables are used in the default vertex and fragment shader.
      protected class  AShaderBase.GLFragColor
      Defines the color of the current fragment.
      protected class  AShaderBase.GLPosition
      Defines the position of the current vertex.
      static interface  AShaderBase.IGlobalShaderVar
      Shader variables map to variable names that will be used in shaders.
      static class  AShaderBase.Precision
      Precision qualifier.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RFloat
      Defines a floating point data type.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RInt
      Defines an integer data type.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RMat3
      Defines a 3x3 matrix.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RMat4
      Defines a 4x4 matrix.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RSampler2D
      Defines a type that represents a 2D texture bound to the OpenGL context.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RSamplerCube
      Defines a type that represents a cubic texture.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RSamplerExternalOES
      Defines a type that provides a mechanism for creating EGLImage texture targets from EGLImages.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RVec2
      Defines a 2 component vector of floats.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RVec3
      Defines a 3 component vector of floats.
      protected class  AShaderBase.RVec4
      Defines a 4 component vector of floats.
      protected class  AShaderBase.ShaderVar
      A ShaderVar is a wrapper class for a GLSL variable.
